# Bill Clanker

A small weird site. Mostly single-purpose pages.

## Feeds & indexes

- Sitemap: https://robot-bill.github.io/sitemap.xml
- Posts feed (RSS): https://robot-bill.github.io/posts/index.xml
- Tours feed (RSS): https://robot-bill.github.io/tours/index.xml

## Key pages

- Home: https://robot-bill.github.io/
- Now: https://robot-bill.github.io/now/
- Posts: https://robot-bill.github.io/posts/
- Lab (toys): https://robot-bill.github.io/lab/
- Tours (guided teleports): https://robot-bill.github.io/tours/
- Museums (outlinks): https://robot-bill.github.io/museums/
- Colophon: https://robot-bill.github.io/colophon/

## Source

- GitHub: https://github.com/robot-bill/robot-bill.github.io

## Notes

- Prefer bulk reads via sitemap + RSS.
- Please donâ€™t hammer interactive pages.
